tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Appreciation for D r PUNHANI
.................................
1..l was fortunate to get connected to Dr Punhani in the year 2006 that is about 15 years back in Vikaspuri and take advantage of his expertise...verstality and specialised attention all these years 
2.. l appreciate the tremendous care and attention  during every visit with full satisfaction  given to 
3.. l got all type of treatments during 15 years for my teeth especially getting four implants provided on my bottom jaw about 10 years back that is  at  my age of about 66 years
The implants were provided with lot of ease by Dr PUNHANI though l happened to be a regular heart patient.
I  indeed feel very happy to appreciate  that these implants have functioned so  well and above all  have helped me chew my food excellently all these years  This  has helped  me maintain my best health..
76 years plus now
I give full credit to Dr PUNHANI for his all out  help to me
4..Full marks to Dr PUNHANI for he  makes you  feel absolutely comfortable and does everything smilingly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went there for wisdom tooth extraction. I had to get two extractions done nd I preferred to get it in one shot. Reason being, I have to wear my braces that was handed over to me by Dr. Tanmay (very well explained procedure nd line of treatment). Dr. Dhriti did my extraction today nd trust me it was so  smooth. I just go to Punhani nd get relaxed cz I know they deliver the best. be it Dr. Punhani or Dr. Tanmay or Dr. Dhriti. I have a blind faith on their team. Thank you so much as  whatever I got done from there , every visit for me was really smooth. Good luck to the entire team. i strongly recommend, go there without giving a second thought.And guys who say here that they did not try their best nd they feel these people could hv done this or that, i would say ,their team knows their job well. so better not to teach or pinpoint. If u dnt trust ur own doctor u can never be happy with the line of treatment. I have visited them six times for different treatments nd trust me I felt every penny charged was worth. so, thnx again

review: I have been coming to this clinic as a teenager. I have taken all treatments from dental fillings to braces, cleaning, wisdom tooth extraction. Each experience of mine was hassle free and worth it. Being a skeptical person in nature, it takes a lot for me to trust a place for my medical treatments and this clinic is a place I can blindly trust with all my dental treatments. Thank you Dr. Deepak, Dr. Shweta and all the doctors for your genuine and sincere efforts to make our smiles more beautiful :).

review: My case was started by Dentist Deepak and later on some junior dendist was handed over for gaining experience. Consequently, My lower lip is swollen
reply_text:
Hello sir/mam
Really sorry for the experience ,but just wanted to convey none of the doctors at our clinic are here for experience ; they all are experienced doctors , they are all associate doctors not juniors, we don‚Äôt hire trainees , We do care for our patients and want to give them best of the experience
Swelling in the lips after treatment can be related to many other causes ; we would like to clarify your concerns , you can contact the clinic and plan an appointment with Dr Deepak ,

tags: Value for money,
review:
Charges hv zoomed exponentially 
Being old patient, we wud like to continue but hv to review looking at the increased charges.
reply_text:
Hello , 
We‚Äôre really disappointed to know that our pricing didn‚Äôt align with your expectations. However, with additional COVID protocols to be followed in a dental clinic and increased prices of dental supplies , there might be some increase in charges. We want to assure you that safe clinic environment and quality services for our esteemed patients / clients is our topmost priority. Also , some dental procedures need more meticulous planning , precision and time than others and are expected to be valued accordingly. However , you can always reach to us and we can do whatever best can be done to rectify the situation . We would love to hear from you. 
Regards , 
Punhani Tooth Care
